text: Germany is the world's biggest user of wind power with an installed capacity of 20,621MW in 2006, ahead of Spain which had 11,615MW. There are 18,000 wind turbines in Germany. The country plans to build more. ==Related pages== * Renewable energy in Germany * Passivhaus * Global warming ==References== Category:Wind farms Category:Economy of Germany de:Windenergie#Deutschland
title: Wind power in Germany
